name: VillageQuest
description:
=============================================================

Final project for Intermediate Unity

Made in approximately 20 hours total.

=============================================================

CONTROLS

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right

Space - Continue Dialogue

=============================================================

Asset Credits:

+  TinyRPGTown by Ansimuz (Textures and Materials)

+ Roguelike RPG Pack by Kenney (Textures and Materials)

+ Food by HenrySoftware (Textures and Materials)

+ 16x16 RPG Icon Pack by Kyrise's (Textures and Materials)

+  Loop !! by Marching Dreams (Audio/Music)

+ Followed Unity RPG Tutorial by gamesplusjames
